ThingDef.label: uniform cap
ThingDef.description: A formal cap for military personnel.

ThingDef.label: Sith uniform
ThingDef.description: These are simple garments that protect little more than the modesty of the wearer.

ThingDef.label: Sith Officer cap
ThingDef.description: A formal cap for military personnel.

ThingDef.label: Sith Officer uniform
ThingDef.description: These are simple garments that protect little more than the modesty of the wearer.

ThingDef.label: Sith Trooper Armor (polished)
ThingDef.description: This full body armor is standard issue for Sith infantry forces.

ThingDef.label: Sith Trooper Helmet (polished)
ThingDef.description: This helmet is standard issue for Sith infantry forces.

ThingDef.label: Sith Trooper Armor
ThingDef.description: This full body armor is standard issue for Sith infantry forces.

ThingDef.label: Sith Trooper Helmet
ThingDef.description: This helmet is standard issue for Sith infantry forces.

ThingDef.label: Sith Commando Armor (polished)
ThingDef.description: This bulky suit of powered armor was originally intended to be worn by a new generation of shock troopers with advanced urban warfare training that would spearhead the Sith's final assault on the core worlds, though only a limited number of units were produced before the destruction of the Star Forge.

ThingDef.label: Sith Commando Helmet (polished)
ThingDef.description: This bulky powered helmet was originally intended to be worn by a new generation of shock troopers with advanced urban warfare training that would spearhead the Sith's final assault on the core worlds, though only a limited number of units were produced before the destruction of the Star Forge.

ThingDef.label: Sith Commando Armor
ThingDef.description: This bulky suit of powered armor was originally intended to be worn by a new generation of shock troopers with advanced urban warfare training that would spearhead the Sith's final assault on the core worlds, though only a limited number of units were produced before the destruction of the Star Forge.

ThingDef.label: Sith Commando Helmet
ThingDef.description: This bulky powered helmet was originally intended to be worn by a new generation of shock troopers with advanced urban warfare training that would spearhead the Sith's final assault on the core worlds, though only a limited number of units were produced before the destruction of the Star Forge.

ThingDef.label: Sith Apprentice tunic
ThingDef.description: These are simple robes, kept modest not by a desire to appear humble, but to offer the greatest freedom of movement during battle.

ThingDef.label: hood, masked
ThingDef.description: A masked hood for remaining anonymous.

ThingDef.label: Sith Assassin tunic
ThingDef.description: These are simple robes, kept modest not by a desire to appear humble, but to offer the greatest freedom of movement during battle.

ThingDef.label: Sith Assassin mask
ThingDef.description: The last thing any assassin wants is to choke on their own nerve gas. This Sith mask both channels the force and filters harmful fumes.

ThingDef.label: Sith Warrior tunic
ThingDef.description: Designed for those who relish personal combat, and know that power comes to those who take it, these robes offer good protection with no hindrance to movement.

ThingDef.label: Sith mask
ThingDef.description: This mask blocks outside mental influence and other sensory noise, allowing the user to focus their abilities inward with no distraction.

HediffDef.label: Sith mask
HediffDef.description: This mask blocks outside mental influence and other sensory noise, allowing the user to focus their abilities inward with no distraction.

ThingDef.label: Sith Marauder armor (polished)
ThingDef.description: This armor offers superior protection with minimal restriction of movement. This is the armor of a true master, one whose will and authority go unopposed.

ThingDef.label: Sith Marauder armor
ThingDef.description: This armor offers superior protection with minimal restriction of movement. This is the armor of a true master, one whose will and authority go unopposed.
